snippet: Too little is known about what has become of millions of dollars in ransom money paid to Somali pirates, and too few hostage takers are being prosecuted, British lawmakers said in a report released on Thursday.
abstract: British Parliamentary report warns that not enough work is being done to track down millions of dollars in ransom money paid to Somali pirates, and too few hostage takers are being prosecuted.
lead_paragraph: Too little is known about what has become of millions of dollars in ransom money paid to Somali pirates, and too few hostage takers are being prosecuted, British lawmakers said in a report released on Thursday.

headline.main: Britain: Parliamentary Report Questions Policy on Somali Piracy
headline.print_headline: Britain: Parliamentary Report Questions Policy on Somali Piracy
